mapper.select: select *, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') fmtdate, format(price, 0) fmtprice, (select count(*) from favorite where uid = #{uid} and store_id = #{store_id}) ucnt from store where store_id = #{store_id};

select *, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') fmtdate, format(price,0) fmtprice from store where title like concat('%',#{query},'%') or contents like concat('%',#{query},'%') order by store_id desc limit #{start}, #{size};
mapper.insert: insert into store(user_id, title, contents, image, price, stock, level, tag, category) values(#{user_id}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{image}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{level}, #{tag}, #{category});
mapper.select: select count(*) from comments where store_id = #{store_id} and category=5;
select * from comments where store_id = #{store_id} and category=6;
select count(*) from comments where store_id = #{store_id} and category=6 and upper_id!=0;
mapper.delete: delete from likes where user_id=#{user_id} and store_id=#{store_id}
